documentType: Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 7, 2019. It includes headcounts by housing unit, out-count forms for inmates assigned to various duties or appointments, and a specific roster showing Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to an attorney visit.

events.title: Daily inmate counts and assignments at MCC
events.description: Routine administrative headcounts and tracking of inmate assignments (e.g., food service, sanitation, hospital, attorney visits) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein's attorney visit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded on an inmate roster with the assignment 'ATTY', indicating he had a scheduled attorney visit on this date.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York as of August 7, 2019.
On August 7, 2019, Epstein was recorded as having an assignment for an attorney visit ('ATTY'), placing him in housing unit Z04-206LAD.
The documents show standard Bureau of Prisons administrative procedures, including headcounts by housing unit and out-counts for inmates assigned to work details or appointments.
Several other inmates are listed with assignments such as Food Service (FS), Sanitation (SANI), and Hospital (HOSP).
Some inmate assignments on the Food Service roster are marked with 'SUICIDE OR', which likely indicates they were on suicide observation or watch.
